channel.title: onewheel on kimchiest.com
channel.description: Recent content in onewheel on kimchiest.com

item.title: Smol Thoughts
item.description: City ride from Darling harbour through Barangaroo to Rocks and Circular quay. Fun 🤩 Written in Korean 느지막이 일어나 세수도 안하고 마차 크로쌍 사러 갔다가 나간김에 장도 봐가지고 왔다. 주말 오후 쇼핑몰 졸라 싫음. ㅋㅋ 크로와상 정말이지 너무 맛있어 💕💓 외로워서 죽을것 같은 시간에는 개미 한마리 없다가 혼자라도 재밌게 잘 살 수 있어 라고 마음이 조금 단단해 지면 그때 꼭 어디서 슬금슬금 기어들 나오더라 그럼 나는 또 맥도 못추고 사랑에 빠졌다.

item.title: Nintendo Switch, Sex Chair
item.description: Got nintendo switch for late bday present, I am not complaining but… I don’t have friends to play mariokart together ok Presents that i got a lot Powerbanks/ portable chargers Gaming stuffs Nintendo wii Nintendo ds Nintendo switch I understand why people give me batteries but what about nintendos, do I look like Pokémon trainer? Last Saturday I went out 3 times to just ride OW.

item.title: Birthday, Blogging
item.description: It has been a year after I refused to write. People still mention about my blog, even people who never knew about it started asking me, “I heard that you had a blog before…” Blogging was fun, The funniest part was that it makes me feel like I’m worthwhile. It is fascinating that someone spends their own time to read my stories. Some of them even try to interact with me because they find me interesting from what I write.
